comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Name is spelled Morris Sheppard. Senator from Texas. Prominent prohibitionist. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morris_Sheppard

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Cynthia Wenslow: Thanks for catching that typo and pointing to additional information on Sen. Sheppard. We will correct the record when we update it.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Morris Sheppard was in the news in 1913 when he resigned his seat in the House of Representatives to fill a vacancy in the U. S. Senate.
